context: The MoD states that its principal objectives are to defend the <a2_0>United Kingdom of <a1_0>Great Britain and Northern Ireland<a2_0/><a1_0/> and <b9_0>its interests<b9_0/> and to strengthen <a0_0><b5_0>international peace and stability<b5_0/><a0_0/>. With the collapse of the Soviet Union and the end of the Cold War, the MoD <b6_0>does not foresee any short-term conventional military threat<b6_0/>; rather, it has identified <a3_0><b7_0>weapons of mass destruction, international terrorism, and failed and failing states<b7_0/><a3_0/> as the overriding threats to Britain's interests. The MoD also manages <a4_0><b8_0>day-to-day running of the armed forces, contingency planning and defence procurement<b8_0/><a4_0/>.
